item.title: 100 days of code
item.author: Author
item.description: For those of you unfamiliar, 100 days of code is.. Coding has always been a big part of my job. Creating client websites or writing scripts to run micro-services for clients. However, I only really know what I need to get by. I’m going to spend the next 100 days delibreately learning and sharpening my coding skills. Day 0 - Getting prepared I’ve created some goals to keep my focussed on my 100 days of code journey.
